title: Activity-Based Welder Training: Extended Blended Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training using on-site work packages, supplemented by real-time video collaboration tools (industrial streaming/VR)

learning_goals: Independently perform welding work packages at 80% or higher proficiency according to industry standards (IIW guidelines).
Achieve 90% task accuracy after receiving remote guidance using digital collaboration tools (video conferencing/streaming).
Demonstrate the ability to solve real-world production process issues through project-based assessment (minimum two case studies).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
